content.text: Trial 1/5, Stage 'corner1': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The image shows a corner-shaped groove, with the user's gaze marked by a red circle on the upper left part of the corner. The groove orientation is primarily horizontal, aligned with the X-axis to the right in the camera frame. 

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
